AUTO_ROLES.TITLE: Automated Role Assignment
AUTO_ROLES.DESC: Roles are updated instantly on Discord as soon as a milestone is reached (includes ghost-stream protection).

DASHBOARD.TITLE: Admin Dashboard
DASHBOARD.DESC: Manage rewards, channels, and manually adjust stream times via the web interface.

ANTI_GHOST.TITLE: Anti-Ghosting System
ANTI_GHOST.DESC: Automated scan that detects if a stream is running without viewers or if Discord shows the wrong status.

LEVEL_UP.TITLE: Level-Up Notifications
LEVEL_UP.DESC: Send embed messages to the chat as soon as a user reaches a new milestone.

LEADERBOARD.TITLE: Interactive Leaderboard
LEADERBOARD.DESC: Public website that displays all streamers sorted by their stream time.

I18N.TITLE: Language Selection
I18N.DESC: International language options for the entire platform.

GLOBAL_RANK.TITLE: Global Ranking System
GLOBAL_RANK.DESC: International accessibility of the bot across different regions.

TOGGLE_RANK.TITLE: Manual Opt-In/Out
TOGGLE_RANK.DESC: Users can decide for themselves whether they want to participate in the ranking.

PROFILE_CARDS.TITLE: Custom Profile Cards
PROFILE_CARDS.DESC: Users can personalize their background image on the ranking page.

PREVIEW.TITLE: Live Stream Preview
PREVIEW.DESC: A small window showing the current stream directly on the website.

STREAKS.TITLE: Streak System
STREAKS.DESC: Individual stream streaks are tracked and rewarded.

OBS.TITLE: OBS Overlay with Animations
OBS.DESC: Role upgrades integrated as animated OBS overlays.
